title: Check if your client qualifies for legal aid
description: Complete application for legal aid assistance

fields.question: What is your full name?
fields.name: full_name
fields.hint: Enter your full legal name as it appears on official documents

fields.question: What is your date of birth?
fields.name: date_of_birth
fields.hint: For example, 27 3 1980

fields.question: Are you applying on behalf of someone else?
fields.name: applying_for_other
fields.hint: Choose Yes if you are a legal representative or guardian

steps.title: Representative Details
steps.description: Tell us about the person you're representing

fields.question: What is the full name of the person you're representing?
fields.name: client_full_name
fields.hint: Enter the client's full legal name

fields.question: What is your relationship to this person?
fields.name: relationship_type
fields.hint: Select your legal relationship to the applicant

fields.question: Do you have legal authority to act on their behalf?
fields.name: has_legal_authority
fields.hint: This could be through Power of Attorney, court order, or professional capacity

steps.title: Legal Authority Required
steps.description: You need proper authorization to continue

fields.question: You cannot proceed without proper legal authority
fields.name: authority_info
fields.hint: Please obtain the necessary legal documentation before continuing with this application. Contact our office for guidance on the required documents.

fields.question: What is your phone number?
fields.name: phone_number
fields.hint: Include area code, for example 020 7946 0234

fields.question: What is your email address?
fields.name: email_address
fields.hint: We'll use this to contact you about your application

fields.question: How would you prefer us to contact you?
fields.name: preferred_contact
fields.hint: Choose your preferred method of communication

steps.title: Case Information
steps.description: Tell us about your legal matter

fields.question: What type of legal matter is this?
fields.name: case_type
fields.hint: Select the category that best describes your legal issue

fields.question: Is this matter urgent?
fields.name: urgency_level
fields.hint: Urgent matters may be prioritized for review

steps.title: Family Law Details
steps.description: Specific information about your family law matter

fields.question: What type of family law matter is this?
fields.name: family_law_type
fields.hint: Select all that apply to your situation

fields.question: Are there children involved?
fields.name: children_involved

steps.title: Housing Law Details
steps.description: Specific information about your housing matter

fields.question: What type of housing issue are you facing?
fields.name: housing_issue_type

fields.question: Are you currently facing immediate risk of homelessness?
fields.name: homelessness_risk
fields.hint: This helps us prioritize urgent cases

steps.title: Immigration Law Details
steps.description: Specific information about your immigration matter

fields.question: What type of immigration matter is this?
fields.name: immigration_issue_type

fields.question: Do you have current legal status in the UK?
fields.name: current_legal_status

steps.title: Criminal Law Details
steps.description: Specific information about your criminal law matter

fields.question: What type of criminal law matter is this?
fields.name: criminal_matter_type

fields.question: Are you currently in police custody or detained?
fields.name: currently_detained

fields.question: This is an urgent matter requiring immediate attention
fields.name: urgent_details
fields.hint: Please call our emergency line immediately: 0800 123 456. Provide details of your current situation and location.

fields.question: How many children are involved?
fields.name: number_of_children
fields.hint: Enter the number of children affected by this matter

fields.question: Ages of children
fields.name: children_ages
fields.hint: List the ages of all children involved, separated by commas

steps.title: Case Details
steps.description: General information about your legal matter

fields.question: Briefly describe your legal issue
fields.name: case_description
fields.hint: Provide a brief summary of your legal matter (maximum 500 words)

steps.title: Financial Information
steps.description: We need to assess your financial eligibility

fields.question: What is your monthly income?
fields.name: monthly_income
fields.hint: Include all sources of income before tax (£)

fields.question: Do you receive any benefits?
fields.name: benefits_received
fields.hint: Select all benefits you currently receive

fields.question: I declare that the information I have provided is true and complete
fields.name: declaration_agreement
fields.hint: You must agree to this declaration to submit your application
